tldr: Affected versions of this package are vulnerable to a Server-Side Request Forgery (SSRF) bypass due to insufficient validation of URLs during HTTP redirects, where the `HttpUriPlugin` would follow a redirect to a location without properly re-checking it against the `allowedUris` policy or enforcing protocol and redirect limit constraints, allowing an attacker who controls a redirect response to potentially force the server to make unauthorized requests to internal systems or arbitrary external domains.
doest_this_affect_me: You are affected if you are using a version that falls within the vulnerable range.
how_to_fix: Upgrade the `@rspack/core` library to the patch version.
